mapper.insert: INSERT INTO survey (surveyno, topic, startdate, enddate, poster, postersaved, posterthumb, postersize, cnt, continueyn) VALUES (survey_seq.NEXTVAL, #{topic}, #{startdate}, #{enddate}, #{poster,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postersaved,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{posterthumb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postersize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{continueyn,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT surveyno, topic, startdate, enddate, posterthumb, postersize, cnt, continueyn FROM survey ORDER BY surveyno DESC
SELECT surveyno, topic, startdate, enddate, posterthumb, postersize, cnt, continueyn FROM survey WHERE topic LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ORDER BY surveyno DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY surveyno DESC) AS rn, surveyno, topic, startdate, enddate, poster, postersaved, posterthumb, postersize, cnt, continueyn FROM survey ) subquery WHERE rn BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM survey WHERE topic LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
